casebody.data:
THETFORD PROPERTIES
v.
MILLER. No. 175P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2005. William K. Brownlee, Raleigh, for Thetford Properties, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of April 2005 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed pending determination of defendant's appeal in the Court of Appeals by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of April 2005."
